text: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
author: Jim Elliot

text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
author: Og Mandino

text: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
author: Moliere

text: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

text: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

text: The things I want to know are in books my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.

text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil in its worst state, an intolerable one.
author: Thomas Paine

text: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
author: Ambrose Bierce

text: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Lao Tzu

text: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
author: Henry Ford

text: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
author: Tupac Shakur

text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Common looking people are the best in the world: that is the reason the Lord makes so many of them.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
author: Socrates

text: The best proof of love is trust.
author: Joyce Brothers

text: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

text: For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed militia is their best security.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.

text: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

text: I never had a policy I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.

text: Honesty is the best policy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
author: Groucho Marx

text: In giving freedom to the slave, we assure freedom to the free - honorable alike in what we give and what we preserve. We shall nobly save, or meanly lose, the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
author: Dalai Lama

text: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: We have the best government that money can buy.
author: Mark Twain

text: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

text: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
author: Moliere

text: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

text: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.

text: It is not best that we should all think alike it is a difference of opinion that makes horse races.
author: Mark Twain

text: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
author: Kurt Cobain

text: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

text: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
author: Mark Twain

text: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: The short words are best, and the old words are the best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.

text: In war as in life, it is often necessary when some cherished scheme has failed, to take up the best alternative open, and if so, it is folly not to work for it with all your might.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Short words are best and the old words when short are best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

text: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very fast.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.

text: If I'm honest I have to tell you I still read fairy-tales and I like them best of all.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.

text: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
author: Helen Keller

text: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

text: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away.
author: Ronald Reagan

text: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan you should wear it inside, where it functions best.

text: But men are men the best sometimes forget.
author: William Shakespeare

text: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere as long as the policy you've decided upon is being carried out.

text: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.

text: Infinite striving to be the best is man's duty it is its own reward. Everything else is in God's hands.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: I can not believe that war is the best solution. No one won the last war, and no one will win the next war.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

text: 'Tis best to weigh the enemy more mighty than he seems.
author: William Shakespeare

text: If you can't get rid of the skeleton in your closet, you'd best teach it to dance.

text: Perhaps nature is our best assurance of immortality.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Perhaps I know best why it is man alone who laughs he alone suffers so deeply that he had to invent laughter.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
author: Lao Tzu

text: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
author: Edgar Allan Poe

text: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
author: Joel Osteen

text: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.

text: Personally, I just think rap music is the best thing out there, period. If you look at my deck in my car radio, you're always going to find a hip-hop tape that's all I buy, that's all I live, that's all I listen to, that's all I love.
author: Eminem

text: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: You are capable of more than you know. Choose a goal that seems right for you and strive to be the best, however hard the path. Aim high. Behave honorably. Prepare to be alone at times, and to endure failure. Persist! The world needs all you can give.

text: We have the power to make this the best generation of mankind in the history of the world or to make it the last.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: If liberty and equality, as is thought by some, are chiefly to be found in democracy, they will be best attained when all persons alike share in government to the utmost.
author: Aristotle

text: What we have found in this country, and maybe we're more aware of it now, is one problem that we've had, even in the best of times, and that is the people who are sleeping on the grates, the homeless, you might say, by choice.

text: An archaeologist is the best husband a woman can have. The older she gets the more interested he is in her.
author: Agatha Christie

text: A man is relieved and gay when he has put his heart into his work and done his best but what he has said or done otherwise shall give him no peace.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Those who govern, having much business on their hands, do not generally like to take the trouble of considering and carrying into execution new projects. The best public measures are therefore seldom adopted from previous wisdom, but forced by the occasion.

text: Hunger is the best pickle.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

text: It might be said now that I have the best of both worlds. A Harvard education and a Yale degree.

text: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.

text: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.

text: Fatigue is the best pillow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: That government is best which governs least.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.

text: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.

text: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.

text: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

text: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Our best thoughts come from others.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.
author: Aristotle

text: The best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

text: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.

text: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.

text: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning and that's the best they're going to feel all day.

text: Education is the best provision for old age.
author: Aristotle

text: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.

text: The man who makes everything that leads to happiness depends upon himself, and not upon other men, has adopted the very best plan for living happily. This is the man of moderation, the man of manly character and of wisdom.

text: Those who excel in virtue have the best right of all to rebel, but then they are of all men the least inclined to do so.
author: Aristotle

text: To know yet to think that one does not know is best Not to know yet to think that one knows will lead to difficulty.
author: Lao Tzu

text: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.

text: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.

text: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.

text: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
author: Elbert Hubbard

text: The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.

text: I want to be perceived as a guy who played his best in all facets, not just scoring. A guy who loved challenges.

text: Age appears to be best in four things old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Francis Bacon

text: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

text: One of the best things that ever happened to me is that I'm a woman. That is the way all females should feel.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: I've always felt toward the slightest scene, even if all I had to do in a scene was just to come in and say, 'Hi,' that the people ought to get their money's worth and that this is an obligation of mine, to give them the best you can get from me.

text: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.

text: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.

text: He who laughs best today, will also laughs last.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.

text: But what we can do, as flawed as we are, is still see God in other people, and do our best to help them find their own grace. That's what I strive to do, that's what I pray to do every day.

text: You're not going to say anything about me that I'm not going to say about myself. There's so many things that I think about myself if someone really wanted to get at me, they could say this and this and this. So I'm going to say it before they can. It's the best policy for me.
author: Eminem

text: My husband and I are best of friends first and foremost. We fight like cats and dogs, but never stay mad for long. I was lucky to find him, he is in every way, my soulmate.
author: Carnie Wilson

text: In the last analysis, even the best man is evil: in the last analysis, even the best woman is bad.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: The best author will be the one who is ashamed to become a writer.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: After all manner of professors have done their best for us, the place we are to get knowledge is in books. The true university of these days is a collection of books.
author: Albert Camus

text: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

text: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.

text: Honestly, I'd love to be remembered as one of the best to ever pick up a mic, but if I'm doing my part to lessen some racial tension I feel good about what I'm doing.

text: The best executive is one who has sense enough to pick good people to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: As you become more clear about who you really are, you'll be better able to decide what is best for you - the first time around.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: The best things and best people rise out of their separateness I'm against a homogenized society because I want the cream to rise.
author: Robert Frost

text: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.
author: Haniel Long

text: I've always taught that a poor economy is the best opportunity for salespeople because the naysayers and grumblers have already given up, leaving more territory, more opportunities to be successful than in a good economy when virtually all salespeople are out there, giving it their best.

text: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: I am afraid we must make the world honest before we can honestly say to our children that honesty is the best policy.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: The language of excitement is at best picturesque merely. You must be calm before you can utter oracles.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
author: Phyllis Diller

text: It is best to avoid the beginnings of evil.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: I didn't see it then, but it turned out that getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Nothing goes by luck in composition. It allows of no tricks. The best you can write will be the best you are.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: One way or another, we all have to find what best fosters the flowering of our humanity in this contemporary life, and dedicate ourselves to that.
author: Joseph Campbell

text: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
author: Will Rogers

text: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.

text: I am just absolutely convinced that the best formula for giving us peace and preserving the American way of life is freedom, limited government, and minding our own business overseas.
author: Ron Paul

text: You are a product of your environment. So choose the environment that will best develop you toward your objective. Analyze your life in terms of its environment. Are the things around you helping you toward success - or are they holding you back?
author: W. Clement Stone

text: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

text: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.

text: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.

text: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
author: Will Rogers

text: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
author: Richard M. Nixon

text: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
author: Walt Disney

text: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
author: Gilda Radner

text: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
author: Will Rogers

text: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

text: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
author: Mae West

text: Society in every state is a blessing, but government, even in its best stage, is but a necessary evil in its worst state an intolerable one.
author: Thomas Paine

text: It is difficult to make our material condition better by the best law, but it is easy enough to ruin it by bad laws.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Our goal is to make the best devices in the world, not to be the biggest.
author: Steve Jobs

text: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: Civilization had too many rules for me, so I did my best to rewrite them.
author: Bill Cosby

text: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
author: B. F. Skinner

text: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
author: Dave Pelzer

text: We think the Mac will sell zillions, but we didn't build the Mac for anybody else. We built it for ourselves. We were the group of people who were going to judge whether it was great or not. We weren't going to go out and do market research. We just wanted to build the best thing we could build.
author: Steve Jobs

text: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.
author: Dale Carnegie

text: I know my country has not perfected itself. At times, we've struggled to keep the promise of liberty and equality for all of our people. We've made our share of mistakes, and there are times when our actions around the world have not lived up to our best intentions.
author: Barack Obama

text: So let's not use a stylus. We're going to use the best pointing device in the world. We're going to use a pointing device that we're all born with - born with ten of them. We're going to use our fingers. We're going to touch this with our fingers. And we have invented a new technology called multi-touch, which is phenomenal. It works like magic.
author: Steve Jobs

text: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
author: Tim Allen

text: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
author: Ralph Marston

text: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
author: H. L. Mencken

text: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
author: Samuel Butler

text: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: An educated person is one who has learned that information almost always turns out to be at best incomplete and very often false, misleading, fictitious, mendacious - just dead wrong.
author: Russell Baker

text: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

text: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual tax code. This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.
author: Barack Obama

text: Look your best - who said love is blind?
author: Mae West

text: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: I just think it is important that you realize , that you're the best in the world. Whether you are a Democrat or Republican or whether you're libertarian or whatever, you are the best. And we should not ever forget that. And when somebody does not do the job, we got to let them go.
author: Clint Eastwood

text: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
author: Will Rogers

text: We can choose a future where we export more products and outsource fewer jobs. After a decade that was defined by what we bought and borrowed, we're getting back to basics, and doing what America has always done best: We're making things again.
author: Barack Obama

text: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden

text: My aim is to put down on paper what I see and what I feel in the best and simplest way.
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: There's a victory, and defeat the first and best of victories, the lowest and worst of defeats which each man gains or sustains at the hands not of another, but of himself.
author: Plato

text: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

text: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
author: Charles Darwin

text: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
author: Sun Tzu

text: Cynical realism is the intelligent man's best excuse for doing nothing in an intolerable situation.
author: Aldous Huxley

text: When a place gets crowded enough to require ID's, social collapse is not far away. It is time to go elsewhere. The best thing about space travel is that it made it possible to go elsewhere.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

text: For a long time now I have tried simply to write the best I can. Sometimes I have good luck and write better than I can.
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: God is not on the side of the big battalions, but on the side of those who shoot best.
author: Voltaire

text: Never argue at the dinner table, for the one who is not hungry always gets the best of the argument.
author: Voltaire

text: It has always been my belief that a man should do his best, regardless of how much he receives for his services, or the number of people he may be serving or the class of people served.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: I was raised to believe that excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism. And that's how I operate my life.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: Your purpose is to make your audience see what you saw, hear what you heard, feel what you felt. Relevant detail, couched in concrete, colorful language, is the best way to recreate the incident as it happened and to picture it for the audience.
author: Dale Carnegie

text: The best way to sell yourself to others is first to sell the others to yourself.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
author: Jane Austen

text: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment... If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
author: Rita Mae Brown

text: That is what we are supposed to do when we are at our best - make it all up - but make it up so truly that later it will happen that way.
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: The best is the enemy of the good.
author: Voltaire

text: Marilyn Monroe wasn't even her real name, Charles Manson isn't his real name, and now, I'm taking that to be my real name. But what's real? You can't find the truth, you just pick the lie you like the best.
author: Marilyn Manson

text: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

text: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

text: In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends.
author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

text: The best government is a benevolent tyranny tempered by an occasional assassination.
author: Voltaire

text: Everyone enjoys doing the kind of work for which he is best suited.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: In a completely rational society, the best of us would be teachers and the rest of us would have to settle for something else.
author: Lee Iacocca

text: All significant truths are private truths. As they become public they cease to become truths they become facts, or at best, part of the public character or at worst, catchwords.
author: T. S. Eliot

text: The best way to be boring is to leave nothing out.
author: Voltaire

text: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: Our best successes often come after our greatest disappointments.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
author: Andrew Carnegie

text: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
author: Earl Nightingale

text: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
author: Lou Holtz

text: Among the natural rights of the colonists are these: First a right to life, secondly to liberty, and thirdly to property together with the right to defend them in the best manner they can.
author: Samuel Adams

text: The best government is that which teaches us to govern ourselves.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
author: John Wooden

text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: The death of my father is probably the biggest thing that I ever faced. Daddy and I were best friends.
author: Joel Osteen

text: The genius of the United States is not best or most in its executives or legislatures, nor in its ambassadors or authors or colleges, or churches, or parlors, nor even in its newspapers or inventors, but always most in the common people.
author: Walt Whitman

text: The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible.
author: Ray Bradbury

text: Our worldly successes cannot be guaranteed, but our ability to achieve spiritual success is entirely up to us, thanks to the grace of God. The best advice I know is to give is to give those worldly things your best but never your all - reserve the ultimate hope for the only one who can grant it.
author: Mitt Romney

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

text: Which government is the best? The one that teaches us to govern ourselves.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

text: Luck marches with those who give their very best.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: I find that the best way to do things is to constantly move forward and to never doubt anything and keep moving forward, if you make a mistake say you made a mistake.
author: John Frusciante

text: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
author: Dale Carnegie

text: Best of all is it to preserve everything in a pure, still heart, and let there be for every pulse a thanksgiving, and for every breath a song.
author: Konrad von Gesner

text: You teach best what you most need to learn.
author: Richard Bach

text: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

text: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
author: Sarah Orne Jewett

text: The best lack all conviction, while the worst are full of passionate intensity.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: There is an infinite difference between a little wrong and just right, between fairly good and the best, between mediocrity and superiority.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: I just want to do what I do best, and that's fight. I love it.
author: Mike Tyson

text: No one can really honestly be the very best, no one.
author: John Wooden

text: Some of my best leading men have been dogs and horses.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

text: You must accept that you might fail then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
author: Rosalynn Carter

text: You always want to quit while you are ahead. You don't want to be like a fighter who stays too long in the ring until you're not performing at your best.
author: Clint Eastwood

text: To be successful in real estate, you must always and consistently put your clients' best interests first. When you do, your personal needs will be realized beyond your greatest expectations.
author: Anthony Hitt

text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

text: The 1st period is won by the best technician. The 2nd period is won by the kid in the best shape. The 3rd period is won by the kid with the biggest heart.
author: Dan Gable

text: There's a lot of great movies that have won the Academy Award, and a lot of great movies that haven't. You just do the best you can.
author: Clint Eastwood

text: I believe the best service to the child is the service closest to the child, and children who are victims of neglect, abuse, or abandonment must not also be victims of bureaucracy. They deserve our devoted attention, not our divided attention.
author: Kenny Guinn

text: The trite saying that honesty is the best policy has met with the just criticism that honesty is not policy. The real honest man is honest from conviction of what is right, not from policy.
author: Robert E. Lee

text: We must stop thinking of the individual and start thinking about what is best for society.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: If you felt that excitement when you voted for Barack Obama, shouldn't you feel that way now that he's President Obama? You know there's something wrong with the kind of job he's done as president when the best feeling you had was the day you voted for him.

text: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
author: Thomas A. Edison

text: To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
author: William James

text: A well regulated militia, composed of the body of the people, trained in arms, is the best most natural defense of a free country.
author: James Madison

text: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
author: Epictetus

text: Massachusetts children cannot only lead the nation in test scores, they can be competitive with the best in the world. And the gap in achievement among races can virtually disappear.
author: Mitt Romney

text: I want you to remember when our White House reflected the best of who we are, not the worst of what Europe has become.
author: Mitt Romney

text: The strength and power and goodness of America has always been based on the strength and power and goodness of our communities, our families, our faiths. That is the bedrock of what makes America, America. In our best days, we can feel the vibrancy of America's communities, large and small.

text: I have long since come to believe that people never mean half of what they say, and that it is best to disregard their talk and judge only their actions.
author: Dorothy Day

text: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
author: Carl Sandburg

text: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
author: Vladimir Lenin

text: Achievement is not always success, while reputed failure often is. It is honest endeavor, persistent effort to do the best possible under any and all circumstances.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
author: Babe Ruth

text: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
author: Luc de Clapiers

text: Surround yourself with good people. Whether they're the best or not, people are capable of learning if they've got good hearts and they're good souls.
author: Kid Rock

text: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.

text: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
author: Joseph Addison

text: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy, but the best weapon of a democracy should be the weapon of openness.

text: I think what makes our marriage work amid all the glare is that my husband is my best friend. He inspires everything in my life and enables me to do the best that I can. I want to hang out with him more than anyone.

text: Now I see the secret of making the best person: it is to grow in the open air and to eat and sleep with the earth.
author: Walt Whitman

text: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: What we call wisdom is the result of all the wisdom of past ages. Our best institutions are like young trees growing upon the roots of the old trunks that have crumbled away.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.

text: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.

text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
author: Pope John XXIII

text: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.

text: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
author: Euripides

text: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
author: Charles Spurgeon

text: The best argument I know for an immortal life is the existence of a man who deserves one.
author: William James

text: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
author: W. C. Fields

text: Toleration is the best religion.
author: Victor Hugo

text: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
author: Laurence J. Peter

text: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
author: Michel de Montaigne

text: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell

text: Genius always gives its best at first prudence, at last.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

text: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.

text: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth

text: I lead no party I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

text: I don't want to do business with those who don't make a profit, because they can't give the best service.
author: Richard Bach

text: No man who worships education has got the best out of education... Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: Use what talents you possess the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
author: Henry Van Dyke

text: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

text: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
author: Thomas Sowell

text: I don't know why, it's the same reason why you like some music and you don't like others. There's something about it that you like. Ultimately I don't find it's in my best interests to try and analyze it, since it's fundamentally emotional.
author: Jerry Garcia

text: I am not a perfect servant. I am a public servant doing my best against the odds. As I develop and serve, be patient. God is not finished with me yet.
author: Jesse Jackson

text: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: Everywhere I go, I'm asked if I think the universities stifle writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.
author: Flannery O'Connor

text: These things bring you to reality as to how fragile you are at the same moment you are doing something that nobody else is able to do. The same moment that you are seen as the best, the fastest and somebody that cannot be touched, you are enormously fragile.
author: Ayrton Senna

text: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken - and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
author: Margaret Mitchell

text: Goals provide the energy source that powers our lives. One of the best ways we can get the most from the energy we have is to focus it. That is what goals can do for us concentrate our energy.
author: Denis Waitley

text: The deferring of anger is the best antidote to anger.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

text: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk the best of life is but intoxication.
author: Lord Byron

text: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
author: John Locke

text: I think every girl needs to love herself, regardless of anything. Like if you're having a bad day, if you don't like your hair, if you don't have the best family situation, whatever, you have to love yourself and you can't do anything until you love yourself first.
author: Julianne Hough

text: Being a teenager is an amazing time and a hard time. It's when you make your best friends - I have girls who will never leave my heart and I still talk to. You get the best and the worst as a teen. You have the best friendships and the worst heartbreaks.
author: Sophia Bush

text: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
author: Michelangelo

text: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

text: Now I know that Wal-Mart's policies do not reflect the best way of doing business and the values that I think are important in America.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: I am someone who hopes for the best and prepares for the worst.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: Sculpture is the best comment that a painter can make on painting.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.
author: Eddie Vedder

text: The best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

text: I am neither frustrated nor planning anything other than being the best Secretary of State I could be.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: There is no doubt that America remains the premier political, economic, military power in the world, and I both expect and count on it remaining so, because I think that's certainly in our best interest but also the best interests of the world.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: I may be as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

text: Take those chances and you can achieve greatness, whereas if you go conservative, you'll never know. I truly believe what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Even if you fail, learning and moving on is sometimes the best thing.
author: Danica Patrick

text: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: Prescription: A physician's guess at what will best prolong the situation with least harm to the patient.
author: Ambrose Bierce

text: Part of the reason for the ugliness of adults, in a child's eyes, is that the child is usually looking upwards, and few faces are at their best when seen from below.
author: George Orwell

text: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

text: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
author: Andy Warhol

text: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
author: Denis Waitley

text: I have found that being honest is the best technique I can use. Right up front, tell people what you're trying to accomplish and what you're willing to sacrifice to accomplish it.
author: Lee Iacocca

text: No man really knows about other human beings. The best he can do is to suppose that they are like himself.
author: John Steinbeck

text: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

text: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
author: George Allen, Sr.

text: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
author: Josh Billings

text: If the United Nations once admits that international disputes can be settled by using force, then we will have destroyed the foundation of the organization and our best hope of establishing a world order.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: Only a mediocre person is always at his best.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

text: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.
author: Deepak Chopra

text: A boy's story is the best that is ever told.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
author: Charles Kingsley

text: The best way to obtain truth and wisdom is not to ask from books, but to go to God in prayer, and obtain divine teaching.
author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

text: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
author: Mike Ditka

text: Being a blockhead is sometimes the best security against being cheated by a man of wit.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: It is not in the nature of politics that the best men should be elected. The best men do not want to govern their fellowmen.
author: George MacDonald

text: The best thing about giving of ourselves is that what we get is always better than what we give. The reaction is greater than the action.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: If you're feeling insecure and you need to feel special, the best place to go is somewhere foreign where people treat you as special because you're different.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

text: No man fails who does his best.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: The size of your accomplishments, the quality of your achievement, will depend very largely on how big a man you see in yourself, what sort of image you get of your possible self, yourself at your best.
author: Orison Swett Marden

text: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.
author: Colin Powell

text: I think we all have blocks between us and the best version of ourselves, whether it's shyness, insecurity, anxiety, whether it's a physical block, and the story of a person overcoming that block to their best self. It's truly inspiring because I think all of us are engaged in that every day.
author: Tom Hooper

text: In the misfortunes of our best friends we always find something not altogether displeasing to us.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. 'Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.
author: Ben Harper

text: I find myself hoping a total end of all the unhappy divisions of mankind by party-spirit, which at best is but the madness of many for the gain of a few.
author: Alexander Pope

text: Wishful thinking is not idealism. It is self-indulgence at best and self-exaltation at worst. In either case, it is usually at the expense of others. In other words, it is the opposite of idealism.
author: Thomas Sowell

text: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best.
author: Edward Abbey

text: As a general rule, the most successful man in life is the man who has the best information.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people.
author: Fred Rogers

text: The best time I ever had with Joan Crawford was when I pushed her down the stairs in Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?
author: Bette Davis

text: The intention to live as long as possible isn't one of the mind's best intentions, because quantity isn't the same as quality.
author: Deepak Chopra

text: The future hasn't happened yet and the past is gone. So I think the only moment we have is right here and now, and I try to make the best of those moments, the moments that I'm in.
author: Annie Lennox

text: The noir hero is a knight in blood caked armor. He's dirty and he does his best to deny the fact that he's a hero the whole time.
author: Frank Miller

text: I looked on child rearing not only as a work of love and duty but as a profession that was fully as interesting and challenging as any honorable profession in the world and one that demanded the best that I could bring to it.
author: Rose Kennedy

text: For Forms of Government let fools contest whatever is best administered is best.
author: Alexander Pope

text: The best thing we can do if we want the Russians to let us be Americans is to let the Russians be Russian.
author: George F. Kennan

text: You should read history and look at ostracism, persecution, martyrdom, and that kind of thing. They always happen to the best men, you know.
author: George Eliot

text: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: We should often feel ashamed of our best actions if the world could see all the motives which produced them.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: We should often blush for our very best actions, if the world did but see all the motives upon which they were done.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
author: Wilson Mizner

text: I love that for Barack, there is no such thing as 'us' and 'them' - he doesn't care whether you're a Democrat, a Republican, or none of the above... he knows that we all love our country... and he's always ready to listen to good ideas... he's always looking for the very best in everyone he meets.
author: Michelle Obama

text: Use those talents you have. You will make it. You will give joy to the world. Take this tip from nature: The woods would be a very silent place if no birds sang except those who sang best.
author: Bernard Meltzer

text: The wildest colts make the best horses.
author: Plutarch

text: The best interpreter of the law is custom.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Blondes make the best victims. They're like virgin snow that shows up the bloody footprints.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

text: Education must provide the opportunities for self-fulfillment it can at best provide a rich and challenging environment for the individual to explore, in his own way.
author: Noam Chomsky

text: You must be worthy of the best, but not more worthy than the rest.
author: Denis Waitley

text: As long as you as an individual... can convince yourself that in order to move forward as best you can you have to be optimistic, you can be described as 'one of the faithful,' one of those people who can say, 'Well, look, something's going to happen! Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.

text: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?

text: Focused. I'm a hustler. And my hustle is trying to figure out the best ways to do what I like without having to do much else.

text: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
author: Meister Eckhart

text: I want to talk to the bullied kids of the world. Tell them to hang on, it will get better. Know that an 'Iron Chef,' actors, musicians, artists and all successful people have probably been bullied in their life. And the best part of your life is yet to come. Whatever it takes to live, do it!

text: Beer, it's the best damn drink in the world.

text: If anything I try to write something that would be more difficult to film. I tend to see film as competition and would like instead to do what books do best.

text: Do you remember when you were 10 or 11 years old and you really thought your folks were the best? They were completely omniscient and you took their word for everything. And then you got older and you went through this hideous age when suddenly they were the devil, they were bullies, and they didn't know anything.

text: The principle of all successful effort is to try to do not what is absolutely the best, but what is easily within our power, and suited for our temperament and condition.

text: A majority is always better than the best repartee.

text: The best security for civilization is the dwelling, and upon properly appointed and becoming dwellings depends, more than anything else, the improvement of mankind.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Words are not as satisfactory as we should like them to be, but, like our neighbours, we have got to live with them and must make the best and not the worst of them.

text: This is the patent age of new inventions for killing bodies, and for saving souls. All propagated with the best intentions.
author: Lord Byron

text: It's best to have failure happen early in life. It wakes up the Phoenix bird in you so you rise from the ashes.

text: At best the family teaches the finest things human beings can learn from one another generosity and love. But it is also, all too often, where we learn nasty things like hate, rage and shame.

text: The best thing commercially, which is the worst artistically, by and large, is the most successful.

text: The promises of this world are, for the most part, vain phantoms and to confide in one's self, and become something of worth and value is the best and safest course.

text: Voting is a right best exercised by people who have taken time to learn about the issues.

text: The best work is not what is most difficult for you it is what you do best.

text: There is only one failure in life possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows.

text: The best augury of a man's success in his profession is that he thinks it the finest in the world.

text: For what is love itself, for the one we love best? An enfolding of immeasurable cares which yet are better than any joys outside our love.
author: George Eliot

text: If you're lucky enough to have a pretty girl love you and share herself and sleep with you, make that your secret. The best way to spoil love is by talking to too many people about it.

text: Events will take their course, it is no good of being angry at them he is happiest who wisely turns them to the best account.

text: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.

text: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.

text: After all, the best part of a holiday is perhaps not so much to be resting yourself, as to see all the other fellows busy working.

text: Choose your companions from the best Who draws a bucket with the rest soon topples down the hill.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: Also, if you want to reach people, theatre is not always the best way to do it.
author: Harvey Fierstein

text: Let me recommend the best medicine in the world: a long journey, at a mild season, through a pleasant country, in easy stages.

text: He who knows no hardships will know no hardihood. He who faces no calamity will need no courage. Mysterious though it is, the characteristics in human nature which we love best grow in a soil with a strong mixture of troubles.

text: In writing and politicking, it's best not to think about it, just do it.

text: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.

text: Employees are a company's greatest asset - they're your competitive advantage. You want to attract and retain the best provide them with encouragement, stimulus, and make them feel that they are an integral part of the company's mission.

text: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.

text: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.

text: Falling in love is the best way to kill your heart because then it's not yours anymore. It's laid in a coffin, waiting to be cremated.

text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.

text: How long most people would look at the best book before they would give the price of a large turbot for it?

text: A man's best fortune, or his worst, is his wife.

text: I don't believe the most successful people are the ones who got the best grades, got into the best schools, or made the most money.

text: Woman's at best a contradiction still.

text: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.

text: Being a mother is the best thing that ever happened to me. Before you have your first baby you are a girl and then you become a mother. text: On the one hand, the idea of marriage and the sort of traditional family life repulses me. But on the other hand, I long for it, you know what I mean? I'm constantly in conflict with things. And it is because of my past and my upbringing and the journey that I've been on.

text: A man's love, till it has been chastened and fastened by the feeling of duty which marriage brings with it, is instigated mainly by the difficulty of pursuit.

text: People try much less hard to make a marriage work than they used to fifty years ago. Divorce is easier.

text: The death of anti-gay hate speech is no doubt being hastened by the head-spinning speed with which gays as a group - to say nothing of gay marriage - are becoming an unremarkable and even quite traditional parts of American life.

text: Marriage is a lot of things - a source of love, security, the joy of children, but it's also an interpersonal battlefield, and it's not hard to see why: Take two disparate people, toss them together in often-confined quarters, add the stresses of money and kids - now lather, rinse, repeat for the rest of your natural life. What could go wrong?
author: Jeffrey Kluger

text: Marriage is a religious and state issue.
author: Jim DeMint

text: I've had two terrific relationships, but both ended in marriage.

text: I adore the theater and I am a painter. I think the two are made for a marriage of love. I will give all my soul to prove this once more.
author: Marc Chagall

text: Our marriage is between us. If we decide to continue being together or not, it's our business.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

text: There's already a marriage clock, a career clock, a biological clock. Sometimes being a woman feels like standing in the lobby of a hotel, looking at the dials depicting every time zone in the world behind the front desk - except they all apply to you, and all at once.

text: I would absolutely, definitely never sell my wedding pictures to a magazine. I'd like it to be a special day, not a photo shoot. And once you've done that, your marriage becomes everybody else's business.

text: Cross-cultural marriage is difficult, especially when one person has to live in another country. But I thought there was a very good chance of it working because people grow together if they have a common passion.

text: Marriage is like paying an endless visit in your worst clothes.

text: I love the institution of marriage, and I love my marriage.

text: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.

text: Marriage is hard work, period.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship.
author: Kyle Chandler

text: You know, my friends, with what a brave carouse I made a Second Marriage in my house favored old barren reason from my bed, and took the daughter of the vine to spouse.
author: Omar Khayyam

text: Most Americans don't care about gay marriage.
author: Dan Savage

text: I believe in traditional marriage.
author: Karl Rove

text: Well, marriage is a very important part of our culture and our society. If we want to have a hopeful and decent society, we ought to aim for the ideal.
author: Karl Rove

text: A marriage is no amusement but a solemn act, and generally a sad one.
author: Queen Victoria

text: No Congress ever has seen fit to amend the Constitution to address any issue related to marriage. No Constitutional Amendment was needed to ban polygamy or bigamy, nor was a Constitutional Amendment needed to set a uniform age of majority to ban child marriages.

text: I was born to be married. I just feel comfortable there. I love the idea of being partnered for ever. I love my girlfriend, we've been best friends since I was 18. There's not a thing we haven't been through except for marriage... We've had talks about what we would name our kids since we were in our 20s.

text: I would say that the surest measure of a man's or a woman's maturity is the harmony, style, joy, and dignity he creates in his marriage, and the pleasure and inspiration he provides for his spouse.
author: Benjamin Spock

text: Marriage hasn't been my thing. But gay people, knock yourselves out!

text: The way that same-sex marriage should reach the federal level is that it absolutely should be decided by the Supreme Court as quickly as possible. It's a 14th Amendment issue. There's no argument about it.

text: In December 1998, I considered myself an expert on love. I was almost a year into a relationship, one that had grown more slowly than I had wished, but once it flowered it was much more stimulating than any marriage or relationship I had known.

text: I am very old-fashioned about marriage. It is for life and I mean it. I always knew that when I met the right girl, the life I had before - being single, in a band, girls everywhere - would be over.

text: Brands mature over time, like a marriage. The bond you feel with your spouse is different than when you first met each other. Excitement and discovery are replaced by comfort and depth.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

text: I don't have this fantasy about marriage anymore. Everyone says it takes hard work. Well, it kind of does - and I'm much more pragmatic about romance than I used to be.

text: The rule with marriage is the less you talk about it the better, as far as I can tell.
author: Jennifer Garner

text: While 45 of the 50 States have either a State constitutional amendment or a statute that preserves the current definition of marriage, left-wing activist judges and officials at the local levels have struck down State laws protecting marriage.
author: John Boehner

text: And that is why marriage and family law has emphasized the importance of marriage as the foundation of family, addressing the needs of children in the most positive way.
author: John Boehner

text: When David Arquette and I got engaged we started therapy together. I'd heard that the first year of marriage is the hardest, so we decided to work through all that stuff early.

text: Is marriage for ever? I think you get married with the intention that it will be, but who knows?
author: Courteney Cox

text: It's so easy to grow apart marriage takes work.
author: Courteney Cox

text: Marriage is an institution, and you must be fully committed to it.

text: I don't know if I'm built for marriage.
author: Jamie Foxx

text: Sometimes divorce is better than marriage.
author: Sumner Redstone

text: I'm an advocate for gay marriage. I have more gay friends than Carter has pills.
